settings.question: Is this safe for sensitive skin?
settings.answer: This razor is designed for everyday grooming use. If you have sensitive skin, we recommend starting with the wet shaving option or the trimmer settings, and testing on a small area first to see how your skin responds. Always follow the included usage instructions.

settings.question: How do I clean and maintain the razor?
settings.answer: After each use, detach the head and remove any trapped hairs using the included cleaning brush. You can rinse removable parts if appropriate, following the instructions in your user manual. Make sure all parts are dry before reassembling. Regular cleaning helps maintain performance.

settings.question: How long does the battery last?
settings.answer: The razor features a 500mAh lithium battery that takes about 2 hours to fully charge. Actual usage time will vary depending on how you use it, your grooming routine, and other factors. Charge it fully before first use and recharge as needed to maintain performance.

settings.question: Can I use this for wet shaving or just dry?
settings.answer: Yes, this razor is designed for both wet and dry use. You can use it for a quick dry shave when you're in a hurry, or with water for a more comfortable grooming experience. Choose the method that works best for your preference and routine.
